snippet: The Los Angeles Angels received a big lift from Jered Weaver in his timely return to the mound.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Los Angeles Angels defeat Oakland Athletics, 6-0, to avoid a four-game sweep; Angels pitcher Jered Weaver has a strong return to the mound after missing a start; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Angels received a big lift from Jered Weaver in his timely return to the mound.

headline.main: Weaver’s Strong Return Propels Angels Over A’s
headline.print_headline: Strong in His Return, Weaver Propels the Angels Past the A’s
